spec_data.Name: perl-RPM-Specfile
spec_data.Description:
This is a simple module for creation of RPM Spec files. Most of the methods
in this module are the same name as the RPM Spec file element they
represent but in lower case.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:32:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension for creating RPM specfiles
